# ownerNameComponents

**Instance Property**

The name of the item’s owner.

## Declaration

```swift
optional var ownerNameComponents: PersonNameComponents? { get }
```

## Sharing

- **isShared**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item is shared with other users.
- **isSharedByCurrentUser**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item was shared by the current user.
- **mostRecentEditorNameComponents**: The most recent editor’s name.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item is shared with other users.
items.name: isShared

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item was shared by the current user.
